tests.name: Does it print a usage statement when run without arguments?
Test One: removing files
tests.setup: touch test1.testtt; touch test2.testtt; bash final.sh .testtt .
tests.output: sucess!  the script deleted the files!

tests.name: Test Two: backing up files
tests.setup: touch test1.mp3; touch test2.mp3; bash final.sh .mp3 .
tests.output: sucess!  the script deleted the files!
